脱出ゲーム。

column1: \n<リリー>うーん・・・そうね・・・

column1:
\n<リリー>もう殆ど正気が残ってないって感じね。

column2:
\n<Lily>I think they're just barely hanging onto their sanity.
Perhaps just one more slip-up, and they'll submit and become our semen slave.

column1:
\n<リリー>大分正気を失ってきたみたいだけど・・・

もう少し楽しめそう。
column2:
\n<Lily>It seems their mind has slipped quite a bit...
And yet, they're still out there trying to escape.
There's still fun left to be had.

column1:
\n<リリー>思ったよりは楽しませてくれるみたい。

そうこなくっちゃ、堕とし甲斐がないわ。
column2:
\n<Lily>They're a lot more fun than I thought.
For a rotten hunter, anyway.
In the end though, they'll fall before us.

column1:
